basics.label: Sr. Freelance Designer/Product Development Manager
basics.summary: Product Development Manager/Sr. Designer of Apparel, Packaging, and Graphics. Responsible for delivering the fashion needs on a wide range of products. Ability to collaborate with the Product Development team, to execute production. Create trend/theme boards, color palettes and hand/computer sketch. Strong understanding of production as well as cost structure and technical packages. Ability to provide clear, accurate, and complete specifications for each style. Area of Expertise: Strong fabric knowledge of Cut n Sew, Woven's, & Sweaters;

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked cross functionally while building and maintaining relationships with product development departments. Execute all product details including construction, detail, color, form, style, fit, graphic application, trim, etc... [Truncated for brevity]
